 
 SCRIPT, 1411252241, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT min(substr(game_id,8,4)) as start,
            max(substr(game_id,8,4)) as end,
            season
        FROM events
        WHERE season = '1962'
        GROUP BY season 
 SCRIPT, 1411252242, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT * 
        FROM retrosheet_historical_batting 
        WHERE season = '1961' 
        AND ds = '1961-10-10' 
 SCRIPT, 1411252242, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT * 
        FROM retrosheet_historical_batting_career 
        WHERE season = '1961' 
        AND ds = '1961-10-10'
 
 SCRIPT, 1412135845, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT min(substr(game_id,8,4)) as start,
            max(substr(game_id,8,4)) as end,
            season
        FROM events
        WHERE season = '1950'
        GROUP BY season 
 SCRIPT, 1412135845, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0418') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412135952, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT min(substr(game_id,8,4)) as start,
            max(substr(game_id,8,4)) as end,
            season
        FROM events
        WHERE season = '1950'
        GROUP BY season 
 SCRIPT, 1412135952, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0418') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

        WHERE season = '1950'
        GROUP BY season 
 SCRIPT, 1412136545, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0418') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

            max(substr(game_id,8,4)) as end,
            season
        FROM events
        WHERE season = '1950'
        GROUP BY season

 SCRIPT, 1412137367, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 885 
 SCRIPT, 1412137367, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0420') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412137367, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 949 
 SCRIPT, 1412137367, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 949 
 SCRIPT, 1412137367, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0421') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412137444, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT min(substr(game_id,8,4)) as start,
            max(substr(game_id,8,4)) as end,
            season
        FROM events
        WHERE season = '1950'
        GROUP BY season

 SCRIPT, 1412137445, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0424') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412137445, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 1601 
 SCRIPT, 1412137445, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 1601 
 SCRIPT, 1412137445, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0425') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412137447, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2195 
 SCRIPT, 1412137447, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 2195 
 SCRIPT, 1412137447, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0507') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412137448, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2268 
 SCRIPT, 1412137448, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 2268 
 SCRIPT, 1412137448, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0508') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412137450, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0520') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412137450, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2564 
 SCRIPT, 1412137451, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 2564 
 SCRIPT, 1412137451, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name

        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,

            ELSE 'A'

        resp_bat_id

    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0521') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412137454, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 2762 
 SCRIPT, 1412137454, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0602') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412137454, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2784 
 SCRIPT, 1412137454, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 2784 
 SCRIPT, 1412137454, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,

       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,

           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'

 SCRIPT, 1412137457, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 2895 
 SCRIPT, 1412137457, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0615') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412137457, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2900 
 SCRIPT, 1412137458, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 2900

 SCRIPT, 1412137461, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3008 
 SCRIPT, 1412137461, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0628') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412137461, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3017 
 SCRIPT, 1412137461, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3017

 SCRIPT, 1412137465, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3103 
 SCRIPT, 1412137465, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3103 
 SCRIPT, 1412137465, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0711') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412137465, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3103 
 SCRIPT, 1412137465, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3103

 SCRIPT, 1412137469, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3188 
 SCRIPT, 1412137469, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0724') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412137469, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3188 
 SCRIPT, 1412137469, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3188

 SCRIPT, 1412137473, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3229 
 SCRIPT, 1412137473, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0806') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412137473, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3235 
 SCRIPT, 1412137473, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3235

 SCRIPT, 1412137477, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3270 
 SCRIPT, 1412137477, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0819') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412137477, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3270 
 SCRIPT, 1412137477, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3270

 SCRIPT, 1412137481, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3319 
 SCRIPT, 1412137481, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0901') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412137481, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3324 
 SCRIPT, 1412137481, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3324

                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'

           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'

    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412137485, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3366 
 SCRIPT, 1412137485, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3366 
 SCRIPT, 1412137485, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0914') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412137485, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3369 
 SCRIPT, 1412137485, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3369

    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0926') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412137489, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3450 
 SCRIPT, 1412137489, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3450 
 SCRIPT, 1412137489, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0927') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412137489, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3454 
 SCRIPT, 1412137489, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3454

 SCRIPT, 1412137491, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3492 
 SCRIPT, 1412137491, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT min(substr(game_id,8,4)) as start,
            max(substr(game_id,8,4)) as end,
            season
        FROM events
        WHERE season = '1951'
        GROUP BY season 
 SCRIPT, 1412137491, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT * 
        FROM retrosheet_historical_batting_career 
        WHERE season = '1950' 
        AND ds = '1950-10-02'

 SCRIPT, 1412137493, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2

           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name

        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0423') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412137493, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 1604 
 SCRIPT, 1412137493, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3710 
 SCRIPT, 1412137493, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0424') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412138084, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT min(substr(game_id,8,4)) as start,
            max(substr(game_id,8,4)) as end,
            season
        FROM events
        WHERE season = '1950'
        GROUP BY season

       a.situation,

           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2

           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM

        season,

            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,

            ELSE 'A'

                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'

    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0429') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412138086, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 1855 
 SCRIPT, 1412138086, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 1855 
 SCRIPT, 1412138086, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0430') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412138089, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 2380 
 SCRIPT, 1412138089, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0512') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412138089, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2390 
 SCRIPT, 1412138089, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 2390 
 SCRIPT, 1412138089, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'H'
            ELSE 'A'
        END AS home_away,
        pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'noneon'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'basesloaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'scoringpos2out'
            ELSE 'scoringpos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0513') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

            ELSE 'A'

            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'runnerson'

 SCRIPT, 1412180941, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT min(substr(game_id,8,4)) as start,
            max(substr(game_id,8,4)) as end,
            season
        FROM events
        WHERE season = '1950'
        GROUP BY season 
 SCRIPT, 1412180941, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0418') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412180942, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 1453 
 SCRIPT, 1412180942, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 1453 
 SCRIPT, 1412180942, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0422') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412180942, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 1676 
 SCRIPT, 1412180942, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 1676 
 SCRIPT, 1412180942, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0423') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412180944, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 2342 
 SCRIPT, 1412180944, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE

                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'

           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name

        season,

            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE

            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0503') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412180944, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2418 
 SCRIPT, 1412180944, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 2418 
 SCRIPT, 1412180944, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0504') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412180944, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2486

 SCRIPT, 1412180947, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,

            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,

            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,

            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'

            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0515') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412180947, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2864 
 SCRIPT, 1412180948, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 2864 
 SCRIPT, 1412180948, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0516') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412180948, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2887

 SCRIPT, 1412180951, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3097 
 SCRIPT, 1412180951, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0527') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412180951, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3107 
 SCRIPT, 1412180951, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3107 
 SCRIPT, 1412180951, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0528') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412180951, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3124

 SCRIPT, 1412180955, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3258 
 SCRIPT, 1412180955, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0608') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412180955, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3274 
 SCRIPT, 1412180955, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3274 
 SCRIPT, 1412180955, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0609') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412180955, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3284

 SCRIPT, 1412180959, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0620') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412180959, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3392 
 SCRIPT, 1412180959, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3392 
 SCRIPT, 1412180959, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0621') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412180963, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3479 
 SCRIPT, 1412180963, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0702') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412180963, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3488 
 SCRIPT, 1412180963, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3488 
 SCRIPT, 1412180963, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0703') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0714') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412180967, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3563 
 SCRIPT, 1412180967, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3563 
 SCRIPT, 1412180967, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0715') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id
