 SCRIPT, 1412180971, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0726') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412180971, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3646 
 SCRIPT, 1412180971, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3646 
 SCRIPT, 1412180971, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0727') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412180975, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3691 
 SCRIPT, 1412180975, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0807') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412180975, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3691 
 SCRIPT, 1412180976, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3691 
 SCRIPT, 1412180976, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0808') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412180979, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3727 
 SCRIPT, 1412180979, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0819') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412180980, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3727 
 SCRIPT, 1412180980, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3727 
 SCRIPT, 1412180980, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'

           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'

 SCRIPT, 1412180984, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0831') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412180984, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3782 
 SCRIPT, 1412180984, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3782 
 SCRIPT, 1412180984, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,

       a.ds,
       a.home_away,

 SCRIPT, 1412180988, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3825 
 SCRIPT, 1412180988, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3825 
 SCRIPT, 1412180988, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0912') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412180988, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3835 
 SCRIPT, 1412180988, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3835 
 SCRIPT, 1412180988, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name

        season,

        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'

    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412180992, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,

            ELSE 'VsUnknown'

    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0923') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412180992, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3906 
 SCRIPT, 1412180992, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3906 
 SCRIPT, 1412180992, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0924') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412180992, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3918

 SCRIPT, 1412180995, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT min(substr(game_id,8,4)) as start,
            max(substr(game_id,8,4)) as end,
            season
        FROM events
        WHERE season = '1951'
        GROUP BY season 
 SCRIPT, 1412180995, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT * 
        FROM retrosheet_historical_batting_career 
        WHERE season = '1950' 
        AND ds = '1950-10-02'

            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0419') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412180997, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 1179 
 SCRIPT, 1412180997, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 4133 
 SCRIPT, 1412180997, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0420') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412181277, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT min(substr(game_id,8,4)) as start,
            max(substr(game_id,8,4)) as end,
            season
        FROM events
        WHERE season = '1950'
        GROUP BY season

 SCRIPT, 1412181277, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 1080 
 SCRIPT, 1412181277, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0420') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412181278, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 1157 
 SCRIPT, 1412181278, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 1157 
 SCRIPT, 1412181278, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0421') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0502') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412181280, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2342 
 SCRIPT, 1412181280, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 2342 
 SCRIPT, 1412181280, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0503') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412181283, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0514') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412181283, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2864 
 SCRIPT, 1412181283, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 2864 
 SCRIPT, 1412181283, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0515') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412181286, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3093 
 SCRIPT, 1412181286, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0526') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412181286, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3097 
 SCRIPT, 1412181287, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3097 
 SCRIPT, 1412181287, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'

            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'

            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'

                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'

        resp_bat_id

 SCRIPT, 1412181311, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT min(substr(game_id,8,4)) as start,
            max(substr(game_id,8,4)) as end,
            season
        FROM events
        WHERE season = '1950'
        GROUP BY season

 SCRIPT, 1412181313, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 1894 
 SCRIPT, 1412181313, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0425') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412181313, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 1915 
 SCRIPT, 1412181313, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 1915 
 SCRIPT, 1412181313, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,

       a.situation,

                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'

            ELSE 'Away'

            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0426') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0506') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412181315, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2566 
 SCRIPT, 1412181315, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 2566 
 SCRIPT, 1412181315, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0507') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412181315, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2650

 SCRIPT, 1412181318, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 2907 
 SCRIPT, 1412181318, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0518') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412181318, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2929 
 SCRIPT, 1412181319, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 2929 
 SCRIPT, 1412181319, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0519') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412181319, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2947

 SCRIPT, 1412181322, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3128 
 SCRIPT, 1412181322, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0530') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412181322, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3167 
 SCRIPT, 1412181322, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3167 
 SCRIPT, 1412181322, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0531') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412181322, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3167

 SCRIPT, 1412181326, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3294 
 SCRIPT, 1412181326, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0611') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412181326, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3308 
 SCRIPT, 1412181326, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3308 
 SCRIPT, 1412181326, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0612') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412181326, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3308

 SCRIPT, 1412181329, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3399 
 SCRIPT, 1412181330, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0623') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412181330, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3409 
 SCRIPT, 1412181330, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3409 
 SCRIPT, 1412181330, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0624') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0705') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412181334, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3527 
 SCRIPT, 1412181334, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3527 
 SCRIPT, 1412181334, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0706') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412181338, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3594 
 SCRIPT, 1412181338, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0717') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412181338, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3607 
 SCRIPT, 1412181338, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3607 
 SCRIPT, 1412181338, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0718') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412181342, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3658 
 SCRIPT, 1412181342, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0729') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412181342, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3667 
 SCRIPT, 1412181342, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3667 
 SCRIPT, 1412181342, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0730') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412181346, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3696 
 SCRIPT, 1412181346, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0810') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412181346, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3699 
 SCRIPT, 1412181346, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3699 
 SCRIPT, 1412181346, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,

       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'

           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'

 SCRIPT, 1412181350, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0822') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412181350, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3751 
 SCRIPT, 1412181351, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3751 
 SCRIPT, 1412181351, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,

       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,

           WHEN (a.event = 2

           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'

           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'

 SCRIPT, 1412181354, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3789 
 SCRIPT, 1412181354, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3789 
 SCRIPT, 1412181354, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0903') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412181355, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3791 
 SCRIPT, 1412181355, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3791 
 SCRIPT, 1412181355, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0904') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412181355, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3799 
 SCRIPT, 1412182977, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT min(substr(game_id,8,4)) as start,
            max(substr(game_id,8,4)) as end,
            season
        FROM events
        WHERE season = '1950'
        GROUP BY season 
 SCRIPT, 1412182977, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,

 SCRIPT, 1412183029, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,

 SCRIPT, 1412183030, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0422') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183030, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 1676 
 SCRIPT, 1412183030, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 1676 
 SCRIPT, 1412183030, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0423') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412183032, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 2418 
 SCRIPT, 1412183032, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0504') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183032, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2486 
 SCRIPT, 1412183032, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 2486 
 SCRIPT, 1412183033, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0505') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id
