        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0516') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183036, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2887 
 SCRIPT, 1412183036, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 2887 
 SCRIPT, 1412183036, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0517') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412183039, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3107 
 SCRIPT, 1412183039, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0528') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183039, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3124 
 SCRIPT, 1412183039, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3124 
 SCRIPT, 1412183039, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0529') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412183043, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3274 
 SCRIPT, 1412183043, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0609') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183043, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3284 
 SCRIPT, 1412183043, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3284 
 SCRIPT, 1412183043, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0610') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412183046, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3392 
 SCRIPT, 1412183046, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0621') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183047, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3397 
 SCRIPT, 1412183047, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3397 
 SCRIPT, 1412183047, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'

           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'

 SCRIPT, 1412183050, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0703') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183050, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3493 
 SCRIPT, 1412183051, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3493 
 SCRIPT, 1412183051, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,

 SCRIPT, 1412183054, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3563 
 SCRIPT, 1412183054, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3563 
 SCRIPT, 1412183054, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0715') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183055, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3569 
 SCRIPT, 1412183055, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3569 
 SCRIPT, 1412183055, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'

            ELSE 'Away'

            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0716') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412183058, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3646 
 SCRIPT, 1412183058, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE

                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'

           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name

        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0726') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183058, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3646 
 SCRIPT, 1412183059, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3646 
 SCRIPT, 1412183059, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0727') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183059, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3649

 SCRIPT, 1412183063, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE

           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name

        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,

            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'

            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0807') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183063, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3691 
 SCRIPT, 1412183063, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3691 
 SCRIPT, 1412183063, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0808') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183063, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3694

 SCRIPT, 1412183067, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3727 
 SCRIPT, 1412183067, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3727 
 SCRIPT, 1412183067, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0819') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183067, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3727 
 SCRIPT, 1412183067, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3727 
 SCRIPT, 1412183067, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0820') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183067, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3735

 SCRIPT, 1412183071, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3781 
 SCRIPT, 1412183071, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0831') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183071, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3782 
 SCRIPT, 1412183071, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3782 
 SCRIPT, 1412183071, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0901') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412183075, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0912') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183076, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3835 
 SCRIPT, 1412183076, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3835 
 SCRIPT, 1412183076, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0913') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412183080, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3906 
 SCRIPT, 1412183080, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0924') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183080, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3918 
 SCRIPT, 1412183080, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 3918 
 SCRIPT, 1412183080, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1950'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0925') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412183083, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT min(substr(game_id,8,4)) as start,
            max(substr(game_id,8,4)) as end,
            season
        FROM events
        WHERE season = '1951'
        GROUP BY season 
 SCRIPT, 1412183083, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT * 
        FROM retrosheet_historical_batting_career 
        WHERE season = '1950' 
        AND ds = '1950-10-02'

 SCRIPT, 1412183084, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 4133 
 SCRIPT, 1412183085, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0420') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183085, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 1457 
 SCRIPT, 1412183085, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 4164

 SCRIPT, 1412183088, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2444 
 SCRIPT, 1412183088, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 4398 
 SCRIPT, 1412183088, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0502') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183088, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2504 
 SCRIPT, 1412183088, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 4408 
 SCRIPT, 1412183089, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,

           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'

            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,

            ELSE 'Away'

            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0503') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412183092, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 4500 
 SCRIPT, 1412183092, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE

                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2

           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM

        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0513') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183093, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2935 
 SCRIPT, 1412183093, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 4511 
 SCRIPT, 1412183093, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0514') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183093, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2946

 SCRIPT, 1412183097, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,

       a.ds,

       a.situation,
       CASE

                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'

           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name

        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,

            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,

            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0525') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183097, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3140 
 SCRIPT, 1412183097, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 4565 
 SCRIPT, 1412183097, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0526') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412183101, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3285 
 SCRIPT, 1412183102, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 4609 
 SCRIPT, 1412183102, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0606') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183102, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3291 
 SCRIPT, 1412183102, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 4611 
 SCRIPT, 1412183102, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0607') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412183106, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 4636 
 SCRIPT, 1412183106, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0618') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183107, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3377 
 SCRIPT, 1412183107, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 4640 
 SCRIPT, 1412183107, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0619') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412183111, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,

       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,

                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0630') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183111, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3455 
 SCRIPT, 1412183111, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 4670 
 SCRIPT, 1412183112, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0701') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412183116, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 4711 
 SCRIPT, 1412183116, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0712') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183116, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3556 
 SCRIPT, 1412183116, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 4719 
 SCRIPT, 1412183117, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0713') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412183121, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0724') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183121, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3654 
 SCRIPT, 1412183121, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 4778 
 SCRIPT, 1412183122, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0725') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0805') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183127, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3750 
 SCRIPT, 1412183127, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 4839 
 SCRIPT, 1412183127, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0806') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412183131, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0817') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183132, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3788 
 SCRIPT, 1412183132, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 4868 
 SCRIPT, 1412183132, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0818') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412183136, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 4909 
 SCRIPT, 1412183137, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0829') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183137, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3844 
 SCRIPT, 1412183137, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 4909 
 SCRIPT, 1412183137, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0830') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id
