 SCRIPT, 1412183141, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 4954 
 SCRIPT, 1412183142, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0910') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183142, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 3901 
 SCRIPT, 1412183142, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 4954 
 SCRIPT, 1412183142, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0911') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412183147, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0922') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183147, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 4051 
 SCRIPT, 1412183147, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 5074 
 SCRIPT, 1412183147, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1951'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0923') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412183152, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 5164 
 SCRIPT, 1412183153, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT min(substr(game_id,8,4)) as start,
            max(substr(game_id,8,4)) as end,
            season
        FROM events
        WHERE season = '1952'
        GROUP BY season 
 SCRIPT, 1412183153, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT * 
        FROM retrosheet_historical_batting_career 
        WHERE season = '1951' 
        AND ds = '1951-10-04' 
 SCRIPT, 1412183153, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 5164 
 SCRIPT, 1412183153, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1952'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0415') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183154, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 654 
 SCRIPT, 1412183154, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 5244 
 SCRIPT, 1412183154, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,

    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183158, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2339 
 SCRIPT, 1412183158, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 5473 
 SCRIPT, 1412183158, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1952'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0427') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183158, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2396 
 SCRIPT, 1412183158, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 5489

    WHERE season = '1952'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0508') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183163, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2831 
 SCRIPT, 1412183163, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 5575 
 SCRIPT, 1412183163, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1952'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0509') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id 
 SCRIPT, 1412183163, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting, 2871 
 SCRIPT, 1412183163, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 5589 
 SCRIPT, 1412183163, exe_sql, sql query, SELECT lower(concat(c.first, '_', c.last)) AS player_name,
       a.resp_bat_id AS player_id,
       a.season,
       a.ds,
       a.home_away,
       a.pit_hand_cd AS vs_hand,
       a.situation,
       CASE
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd = 'G') THEN 'ground_out'
           WHEN (a.event = 2
                 AND battedball_cd != 'G') THEN 'fly_out'
           WHEN a.event = 3 THEN 'strikeout'
           WHEN a.event in(14,15,16) THEN 'walk'
           WHEN a.event = 20 THEN 'single'
           WHEN a.event = 21 THEN 'double'
           WHEN a.event = 22 THEN 'triple'
           WHEN a.event = 23 THEN 'home_run'
           ELSE 'other'
       END AS event_name
    FROM
        (SELECT event_cd AS event,
        season,
        concat(substr(game_id,4,4), '-', substr(game_id,8,2), '-', 
            substr(game_id,10,2)) AS ds,
        CASE
            WHEN bat_home_id = 1 THEN 'Home'
            ELSE 'Away'
        END AS home_away,
        CASE 
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'R' then 'VsRight'
            WHEN pit_hand_cd = 'L' then 'VsLeft'
            ELSE 'VsUnknown'
        END as pit_hand_cd,
        CASE
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 0 THEN 'NoneOn'
            WHEN start_bases_cd = 1 THEN 'RunnersOn'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd = 7
                AND outs_ct != 2) THEN 'BasesLoaded'
            WHEN (start_bases_cd > 1
                AND outs_ct = 2) THEN 'ScoringPos2Out'
            ELSE 'ScoringPos'
          END AS situation,
        battedball_cd,
        resp_bat_id
    FROM events
    WHERE season = '1952'
    AND substr(game_id,8,4) = '0510') a
    JOIN id c ON a.resp_bat_id = c.id

 SCRIPT, 1412183164, multi_insert, retrosheet_historical_batting_career, 5593
